data.message: There are horrendously enormous dilemmas connected to a frustrating overload of Facebook-Suggestions{Ads, Apps, etc.) that continuously plagues my "Facebook-Newsfeeds" on a very harsh daily basis. Additionally I have seriously seen maliciously big occurrences regarding heinous page-suggestions{Adobe Stock, Mega Bloks Collectors, Bernzomatic, Dias Gradiosos Kellogg's) thoughout my whole "Facebook-Newsfeeds". Anyway Facebook Administrators, I really need Facebook to broadly address these "Specified Ugly Circumstances" mentioned entirely in my message today{April.25,2016) concerning what badly happened on Facebook. Lastly Facebook Administrators, "PLEASE" can U help{SOS) me out by providing a urgent resolutions{FIXES, etc.) able to full remedy those "Problematic Matters" effecting me on Facebook.
